淉字的基本解释

淉
guǒ
水名。

淉
guàn
古同“祼”，古代酌酒灌地的祭礼。

淉字的汉语字典释义

[①]［guǒ］
［《集韻》古火切，上果，見。］
水名。
[②]［guàn］
［《集韻》古玩切，去换，見。］
同“祼1”。
古代灌祭。

淉字的康熙字典解释

【巳集上】【水字部】　淉； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页629第11
【廣韻】【集韻】?古火切，音果。【說文】水也。　又【集韻】古玩切，音貫。與祼同。灌祭也。

淉字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
淉字的起名意思

暂无。

淉
Basic explanation of words
淉
guǒ
Water name.
淉
guàn
In ancient times, the same "bare", the ancient sacrificial ritual of drinking wine and filling the ground.
淉
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［guǒ］
["Ji Yun" ancient fire cut, fruit, see. ]
Water name.
[②]［guàn］
["Jiyun" antiques cut, go and change, see you. ]
Same as "祼1".
Ancient offerings.
淉
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Si Ji 1] [Water Word Department] 　淉; Kangxi Strokes: 12; Page Number: Page 629 No. 11
[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Ancient fire cut, sound fruit. [Said the text] Water also.　[Jiyun] Antique cut, sound throughout. Same as bare. Consecration also.
淉

Name meaning
Nothing.
